0110000100010100 1100011100000101 0 -> sum: 0010100000011001, cout: 1

1010010000001000 0001110000010111 0 -> sum: 1100000000011111, cout: 0
1010001011101100 0000000101100101 0 -> sum: 1010010001010001, cout: 0
0100010111001000 0100001111110111 0 -> sum: 1000100110111111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
